full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,PADMA YANG GSANG KHROS PA'I BSKYED RIM GYI RNAM BSHAD PADMA ZHING GI SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @039A *, ,(ZHING GI SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI RDO RJE'I SLOB MA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RAB BRTAN SOGS NANG SLOB 'GA' ZHIG GIS, 'DI LTA BU ZHIG NGES PAR DGOS ZHES YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR, KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE SLOB DPON RNAMS LAS COS 'DI LA CHOS 'DI'I DBANG BZHI YONGS RDZOGS, BKA' SDOD KYI RIGS GTAD DANG, RTA PO YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I LUNG MAN NGAG THOB CING, BSNYEN SGRUB SOGS TSAD DU 'KHYOL ZHING, CHOS 'DI LA NGAL BA MANG DU BYAS PA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYAL MTSAN NAM, 'DI NYID KYI DKYIL 'KHOR DU PADMA RGYAL PO RTZAL GYI MING THOB PAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO NYID DO, ,'DIS KYANG GSANG CHEN RDO RJE THEG PA'I BSTAN PA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,'DI LTA BU SHIN TU ZAB CING GSANG BA'I CHOS 'DI DBANG MA THOB CING SNOD MIN SOGS KYIS LONGS SBYAR NA, CHOS SKYONG BEG RTZE LCAM SRING DANG BKA' SDOD GING LNGA GZA' GDONG 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA DRAG PO'I LAS KYIS TSAR BCOD CIG ,SA MA YA TIshtha, DGE ZHING DON KUN 'GRUB GYUR CIG , ,,)
